internal.content:
---
title: "FaceRecognition【在框识别】"
cover: images/facerecog_cover.jpg
coverAlt: "封面"
description: "学生人脸在框识别"
datePublished: "2020-10-09 17:05:11"
dateModified: "2020-10-09 17:05:11"
category: "框架工具"
tags:
  - Android端
  - kotlin
  - AI
  - 库
  - 图像处理
---

识别图片中是否包含正面面对屏幕的人脸。

### 技术实现

1. kotlin开发android library

2. opencv处理图片，转矩阵/转换颜色空间等

3. mtcnn模型pnet、rnet、onet依次预测，nms后处理

4. 返回结果boxes

5. 利用aspectj插桩对模型推理做耗时检测及优化

### 如何使用

在app module中引入库

```
// app下build.gradle
implementation project(":facerecognition")
```

初始化`MtcnnFaceDetector`，传入context、config、callback三个参数

```kotlin
lateinit var mtcnn: MtcnnFaceDetector
...
mtcnn = MtcnnFaceDetector(this, MtcnnFaceDetector.Config(
    assets2File("pnet_1106.pt"),
    assets2File("rnet_1106.pt"),
    assets2File("onet_1106.pt"),
    0.6f, 0.7f, 0.7f, 20
), object : MtcnnFaceDetector.Callback {
    override fun p(boxes: Vector<Box>) {
    }

    override fun r(boxes: Vector<Box>) {
    }

    override fun o(boxes: Vector<Box>) {
    }
})
```

执行预测

```kotlin
val boxes = mtcnn.detectFace(imgRes)
```
